name: Sheet 'Em Up
description:
For Celly there's just no place like $A$1...

How did Celly end up so far from home? Who knows, Celly's backstory is currently "recalculating".

But you can help Celly get home by picking up power-ups to modify Celly's abilities like jump height and distance. You might even find that you excel at this! Also, something something numbers something 1-2-3 something something visicalc, amirite?

Many games these days are just thinly disguised spreadsheets but "Sheet 'Em Up" isn't disguising the fact it's a hybrid puzzle game & spreadsheet at all!

Controls:

  • Move Left: Left Arrow key
  • Move Right: Right Arrow key
  • Jump: Up Arrow key
